Travel Information

how to reach us

Venue

Pathé Dietlikon
Moorstrasse 2
8305 Dietlikon
The event will be in the Pathé cinema, main track is in the room and the community one is in the hall using headphones

Transport

Bus stop: Industriestrasse : Nr. 787
Bus stop: Dübendorferstrasse : Nr. 748
Parking: 5 CHF for the whole day
From Zurich main station take a train to Oerlikon, here take the bus 787 for 14 stops

11:00 - 11:20 Coffee Break
11:20 - 12:00 Unlock Application Reliability with Distributed Load Testing Luis Guirigay Main
Navigating Networking and Security in Serverless SaaS Platforms Enrico La Sala Community
12:00 - 13:20 Lunch
13:20 - 14:00 From Code to Cluster: Deploying and Observing Apps on Amazon EKS Kevin Nash & Scott Gerring Main

AWS Like an RPG: Choosing Equipment and Planning an Expedition in the Cloud Grzegorz Kalwig Community
